comments.body: Can you test for the existence of the shared library here or is this header-only?

I added the tests in https://github.com/conda-forge/staged-recipes/pull/13628/commits/5e92cf08723cbea0f6a936367274666d586f26cd . For now on Windows the static library is compiled as the use of static libraries is supported in the upstream project, but I plan to eventually patch the upstream project and import the patch to generate shared libraries also on Windows, for [CFEP-18 compliance](https://github.com/conda-forge/cfep/blob/master/cfep-18.md).
Can you test for the existence of the shared library here or is this header-only?

I added the tests in https://github.com/conda-forge/staged-recipes/pull/13628/commits/5e92cf08723cbea0f6a936367274666d586f26cd . For now on Windows the static library is compiled as the use of static libraries is supported in the upstream project, but I plan to eventually patch the upstream project and import the patch to generate shared libraries also on Windows, for [CFEP-18 compliance](https://github.com/conda-forge/cfep/blob/master/cfep-18.md).
